DOC.brief_title: Bare Metal Stent Versus Drug Coated Balloon With Provisional Stenting Non-ST-Elevation Myocardial Infarction
DOC.detailed_description: The aim present trial ass efficacy standalone use SeQuent ( R ) Please coat balloon compare bare metal stent ( BMS ) patient NSTEMI . Primary efficacy endpoint MACE ( cardiac mortality , reinfarction , target lesion revascularization ) 9 month .
DOC.criteria: NSTEMI Ischemic symptom ( angina pectoris ) > 30 minute Last symptom within 72 hour randomization Positive cardiac troponin T , I , hsTroponin 99th percentile age > 18 year Identifiable culprit lesion without angiographic evidence large thrombus intend early PCI ( treatment two lesion allow ) Cardiogenic shock STelevation myocardial infarction No identifiable culprit lesion , Indication acute bypass surgery Comorbidity limit life expectancy < 912 month Contraindication treatment heparin , ASA thienopyridines
